entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:45 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 2:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: 8.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 7.8°C
Wind: S 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
